title: WHERE IS DARK STAR ORNN!
body:
a dark star skin would not only look mint on ornn but tie in with the godlike/higher being backstory also they said they were giving skins to majority of 1 skin champs, please{{champion:516}} make{{champion:516}}dark{{champion:516}}star{{champion:516}}ornn

(also make a cosmic sylas skin ty) {{champion:517}}

replies.body: if you see this I APPROVE. Ive been debating for the last 2 years what skin would fit him i recken a few of voli bears skins would suit Ornn also. or i was thinking with the voli bear rework they make it a VS event between Ornn and Voli bear both getting 2 new Legendary skins

All about it. I love the Thunder Lord skin, but i love all the Dark Star skins too. Honestly think he would look awesome as a Cosmic God!

His Q could be a Dwarf Star that spawns out of the ground that he can dash into, and his hammer could be a galaxy on a stick because i don't have a better idea.
